title: moegreen
author: moegreen
content: What happened: I signed up on 8bet.io on Jan 7th and deposited 0.09 ltc . They had a promo at that time and i was able to wager enough for a withdrawal. After requesting for a cashout it was never processed and my telegram account was blocked by their support ( See screenshot): Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1395644 Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3038024.0 Amount Scammed: 0.09 LTCPayment Method:LTC Proof of Payment: https://prnt.sc/_zCsPGHQdDDb [ I lost access to my wallet so i wasn't able to find the tx id and my 8bet account deposit address has also changed so i can't find it in the blockchain either. I attached a screenshot of my account transaction history PM/Chat Logs: https://prnt.sc/EHjWAxwNn3kL Additional Notes: After contacting them via Telegram they said it will be taken care of and then blocked me for good without an explanation

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: The representative of 8bet.io has not logged in for over a month now but they might come down here to address the issue they have one inactive flag but failed to generate enough support for that flag.It's not ok for a casino to block you without telling you anything about your issue.Is this the whole conversation? Questionable if they blocked without explaining anything, anybody will be confused if they are blocked without any explanation, I hope by posting you can get your answer.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: moegreen on February 24, 2023, 04:17:31 AMWhat happened: I signed up on 8bet.io on Jan 7th and deposited 0.09 ltc . They had a promo at that time and i was able to wager enough for a withdrawal. After requesting for a cashout it was never processed and my telegram account was blocked by their support ( See screenshot): Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1395644 Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3038024.0 Amount Scammed: 0.09 LTCPayment Method:LTC Proof of Payment: https://prnt.sc/_zCsPGHQdDDb [ I lost access to my wallet so i wasn't able to find the tx id and my 8bet account deposit address has also changed so i can't find it in the blockchain either. I attached a screenshot of my account transaction history PM/Chat Logs: https://prnt.sc/EHjWAxwNn3kL Additional Notes: After contacting them via Telegram they said it will be taken care of and then blocked me for good without an explanation I'll quote your entire post for future reference.A bit curious, back in 10 January, you raised similar case against 8bet over 12 0.012 SOL, which they've answered here, stating that you found and detected for free spin abuse.I noticed that you edited your post and thread title today into a case for rollbit,Quote from: moegreen on January 10, 2023, 12:33:26 AMHit 2 210x Plinko balls for $10 each and was only paid one. Watched the balls fall into each 210x... The game itself recorded it, but still wasnt paid. Messaged support and they asked for a video of it... cmon now. Then they said they would be right back with an answer. 8 hours later a new person messages me from support and says "We have checked with our colleague and only 1 is shown".... I literally watched it hit lol, and the game had it in the history.... Their history on the bottom didnt show it. Support pretty much avoiding me at all costs now.Screenshot of my screen:https://postimg.cc/z382Rgjvand it was the exact same case, verbatim, posted by this user, hereQuote from: rollbitscam on February 23, 2023, 08:02:11 PMHit 2 210x Plinko balls for $5 each and was only paid one. Watched the balls fall into each 210x... The game itself recorded it, but still wasnt paid. Messaged support and they asked for a video of it... cmon now. Then they said they would be right back with an answer. 8 hours later a new person messages me from support and says "We have checked with our colleague and only 1 is shown".... I literally watched it hit lol, and the game had it in the history.... Their history on the bottom didnt show it. Support pretty much avoiding me at all costs now. Screenshot of my screen: https://postimg.cc/z382RgjvMay I know why?Quote from: coin-investor on February 24, 2023, 05:33:47 AM[...] they have one inactive flag but failed to generate enough support for that flag.[...]That's because the case that you referred had been answered and solved by the representative of 8bet. The DTs --yes, plural-- overseeing that thread had also came to the same conclusion, which is why the flag is not supported. Not sure why you bother mentioning and referring it.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on February 24, 2023, 09:51:55 AMQuote from: coin-investor on February 24, 2023, 05:33:47 AM[...] they have one inactive flag but failed to generate enough support for that flag.[...]That's because the case that you referred had been answered and solved by the representative of 8bet. The DTs --yes, plural-- overseeing that thread had also came to the same conclusion, which is why the flag is not supported. Not sure why you bother mentioning and referring it.You are right I should have not brought them up without further research but you did good research on OP's post history, apology for my error, it's clear that OP control both account, but why post on two different accounts when this account can do that having registered since 2018?Is it because that one account is dedicated to Rollbit

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.created_time: February 24, 2023, 12:45:58 PMLast edit: February 24, 2023, 01:05:46 PM by holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on February 24, 2023, 12:13:51 PMQuote from: holydarkness on February 24, 2023, 09:51:55 AMQuote from: coin-investor on February 24, 2023, 05:33:47 AM[...] they have one inactive flag but failed to generate enough support for that flag.[...]That's because the case that you referred had been answered and solved by the representative of 8bet. The DTs --yes, plural-- overseeing that thread had also came to the same conclusion, which is why the flag is not supported. Not sure why you bother mentioning and referring it.You are right I should have not brought them up without further research but you did good research on OP's post history, apology for my error, it's clear that OP control both account, but why post on two different accounts when this account can do that having registered since 2018?Is it because that one account is dedicated to Rollbit If I may give a wild assumption, I think its more to OP didn't want to be found by anyone scanning through their past history while investigating this case that they have a previous case, proven to be guilty, and resolved, than they're the same owner of the other thread.So OP copied the first thread on the scam accusation board and used it to edit their past thread. OP even deleted their post stating that the case is solved and they got paid, which unfortunately for them --as every single post on this forum is-- is automatically archived by several platforms. Oh, I also happened to quote that statement,Quote from: holydarkness on January 10, 2023, 04:52:41 PM[...]Quote from: moegreen on January 10, 2023, 10:15:21 AMPlease note : Upon posting this thread the admin of 8bet.io has paid my withdrawal. Thank you !As well as, they don't want people overseeing this case to know that the verdict given by 8bet is valid, that OP did a multi-acc. Here on their previous case, the account is under moegreen1@protonmail, and this case is under justforvpn99@yahoo.https://imgur.com/a/EzfrvFShttps://prnt.sc/EHjWAxwNn3kLI think this case is as good as solved, since 8bet's finding and reason is valid.Edit: mentioning wrong platform name, edited and corrected

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on February 24, 2023, 12:45:58 PM~snip~Well done man! Perhaps, OP thought that the forum members are dumb . But the OP is dumb here. Now I have no doubt that OP was abusing 8Bet bonuses with multiple accounts in the past. And he has provided the proof publicly with his foolish movement at this time.I will leave a negative feedback on his trust page tomorrow. He is an abuser who deserves a feedback. What do you think about it?

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on February 24, 2023, 07:02:16 PM[...]I will leave a negative feedback on his trust page tomorrow. He is an abuser who deserves a feedback. What do you think about it?If I may be honest, I was waiting for them to give some response before leaving any feedback, wanting to let them give further explanation and whatnot, even though it's kinda a clean cut case. Let's say I was curious of what OP tried to pull out of their pocket. I saw them online after I posted my reply and they're online again today, so I think it's safe to say they just admitted their defeat.I'll tag the account as well, so that future scam accusations they raised could be taken with a grain... a bucket of salt.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on February 25, 2023, 08:31:38 PMQuote from: Mahdirakib on February 24, 2023, 07:02:16 PM[...]I will leave a negative feedback on his trust page tomorrow. He is an abuser who deserves a feedback. What do you think about it?If I may be honest, I was waiting for them to give some response before leaving any feedback, wanting to let them give further explanation and whatnot, even though it's kinda a clean cut case. Let's say I was curious of what OP tried to pull out of their pocket. I saw them online after I posted my reply and they're online again today, so I think it's safe to say they just admitted their defeat.I'll tag the account as well, so that future scam accusations they raised could be taken with a grain... a bucket of salt.You are right on this when you post an allegation you should be ready to defend your allegation and be more than willing to prove your case and provide all the pieces of evidence to strengthen your case and back it up as soon as you read the questions and concern, ignoring them will give suspicion on your motives.They may or could create a new account and do the same thing hopefully we can trace them or do the same mistakes again
